price: 我的宗族啊！你们当进安拉所为你们注定的圣地，你们不可败北；否则，你们要变成亏折的人。”
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسَةَ ٱلَّتِي كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ وَلَا تَرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَارِكُمۡ فَتَنقَلِبُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi ud'khulū al-arḍa al-muqadasata allatī kataba al-lahu lakum walā tartaddū ʿalā adbārikum fatanqalibū khāsirīna
